---
title: "Inspect p38a screen"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r message=FALSE}
library(magrittr)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
screen_data <- read_csv("input/p38_data.csv")
```
Recompute adjusted P-value from `KSP5`

```{r}
screen_data <-
  screen_data %>%
  mutate(AdjP_R = p.adjust(KSP5, method = "BH"))
```

There's a linear relationship with `AdjP` but the slope is off.

```{r}
screen_data %>%
  ggplot(aes(AdjP_R / 1.231322e+02, AdjP)) + geom_point() + geom_abline(slope = 1)
```

`AdjP` is a factor of `1.231322e+02` lower for some reason

```{r}
lm(AdjP_R ~ AdjP, screen_data) %>%
  broom::tidy()
```
```{r}
screen_data %>% 
  select(Broad:AdjP_R) %>%
  pairs()
```

- `is_rndm` indicates if the compounds is a Cell Painting negative control (based on correlation to the ORF)
- `medTLR5` is the ratio of the mean of the p38 imaging readout wrt DMSO for that compound (mean across the n=4 replicates)
